channel.title: Problem with portals to underground, puts me in ocean :s
channel.description: alright got this sneaky little training place built and i put a portal there from edge. when it portals there from edge i'm in ocean but i can see the landscape stuff. if i log out and back in it fixes it. vice versa when i go from edge to there then back to edge it makes edgeville all black and i have to log out and back in. what's the issue and how can i fix this?

item.title: Problem with portals to underground, puts me in ocean :s
item.dc:creator: @StNicksBIG StNicksBIG
item.description:
@StNicksBIG wrote:

yea i forgot to replicate the landscape file in for the client side. thx darscape. and let’s pk i have correct coords man, nothing to make fun of.

Read full topic
item.source: Problem with portals to underground, puts me in ocean :s

item.title: Problem with portals to underground, puts me in ocean :s
item.dc:creator: @bonzakid bonzakid
item.description:
@bonzakid wrote:

darscape:

Providing that you have the correct coordinates set, make sure that you replicate the same landscape file that you have for the client, in the server too. (and vise versa)

It’s a common thing that happens to servers, when your in wilderness underground and put a portal to edge, it will go black.

Read full topic
item.source: Problem with portals to underground, puts me in ocean :s
